Subjects also record weekly assessment include : adequate relief IBS severity , constipation severity . At end 12-week treatment period , 4-week randomize withdrawal period subject complete study Tenapanor group randomize either Tenapanor 50mg BID placebo BID ( 1:1 ) subject complete study placebo group assign receive Tenapanor 50mg BID .
